mapper.select:
select hb.`build_name`,hb.`build_id`,hu.unit_name,hl.* from house_building as hb,house_unit as hu,house_list as hl where hb.build_id = hu.build_id and hu.unit_id = hl.unit_id
and hb.build_name like concat('%',#{buildName},'%')
and hu.unit_name like concat('%',#{unitName},'%')
and hl.house_num like concat('%',#{houseNum},'%')
and hl.status like concat('%',#{status},'%')
